formdata.description: Primary email address for the company (must be unique).
Contact phone number (must be 915 digits if provided).
Payment status of the company  must match one of PAYMENT_STATUS_CHOICES.(paid, unpaid, trial)
Company logo or display image, uploaded as a file.
Indicates whether the company is connected to Fleet IT(default False).
Country code (ISO 2-letter format, e.g., US, PK).
ISO 4217 currency code (e.g., usd, eur, gbp)

request.description:
only these fields are allowed to modify in booking using patch method  
allowed_fields = \[  
"extra_ids",  
"notes",  
"mile_used",  
"additional_drivers",  
"fuel_pre_purchase",  
\]

    "content": "{{customer_name}}, your rental of {{fleet_name}} includes comprehensive insurance coverage. {{company_name}} provides liability protection. Contact {{company_phone}} for claims.",
    "is_mandatory": true,
    "is_active": true,
    "supports_variables": true
  }
